result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Antavius Isaiah Lester

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg in court, defendant Antavius Isaiah Lester not in court, in custody.  Alexander C. Dyer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Status Conference. Defendant not produced. Defense counsel requests a Motion Hearing date. Court grants request and orders any responses by the State is to be filed by 11/14/2022. Case adjoured to Br 16.  Motion hearing scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Received and Filed. Defense Motion to Suppress Based on Unlawful Search

Defendant Antavius Isaiah Lester in court with attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg.  Defendant Antavius Isaiah Lester in custody.  Alexander C. Dyer appeared for the State of Wisconsin. All parties appeared by video means. Case is calendared for plea and sentencing. Attorney Rosenberg notified court that defendant was moved to Racine Correctional and she could not set up a meeting with the defendant until after today's court date. Defense is requesting a status date to discuss a potential motion issue. Court sets 08/03/2022 by 5:00pm as the deadline for defense to file a motion. Case is adjourned in Branch 16.  Status conference scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

OFF THE RECORD- Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg in court, defendant Antavius Isaiah Lester not in court, in custody.  Alexander C. Dyer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Defendant not produced. Discussion with parties regarding discovery issues. Defense counsel further requests a Plea/Sentencing date. Case adjourned to Br 16.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Email correspondence with parties. Case re-scheduled for Scheduling Conference on 05/05/2022, Br 16.

Defendant Antavius Isaiah Lester in court with Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg; both appear by video.  Defendant Antavius Isaiah Lester in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 16, Judge Grayson. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 16.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

09:09 AM Defendant Antavius Isaiah Lester not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Antavius Isaiah Lester in court with attorney Matt W Kline.  Defendant Antavius Isaiah Lester in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Antavius Isaiah Lester appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Antavius Isaiah Lester

Prior: 3547 South 2nd Street, Milwaukee, WI 53207
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
